activities.title: Talk Javascript
activities.description: Let me take you on a jorney of demystifying Javascript, it's not as hard as you might think!

activities.title: Shell Basics
activities.description: Every programer is aware that the most powerful tool we have at our dispose is the shell and its scripting tools. The main goal of this talk is to introduce the basics of shell to an unexperienced audience.

activities.title: Chess Tournament
activities.description:
This will be a remote chess tournament, so that everyone interested can join!
Let's take a break from all the programing nonsense and focus on some real thinking.

activities.title: Linux Showcase
activities.description: Have you heard of Linux? If not, this is the place for you. If you've heard about it, this is also the place for you. This showcase aims to show you everything about the world of Linux. From its creation to all the families and distributions that are out there. This is general culture, at least that's what we think!

activities.title: Git Good
activities.description: In almost every group project, the most used program, in order to version control the entire project, is git. This talk will show the workflow of git and all it's glory, so that you can git good!

activities.title: Study Session
activities.description: This time slot will be reserved to every student that wants to study and receive tutoring!
